product_name: Haiku Work Horse Tote Bag - Women's
long_description: Ideal for commuting or weekend getaways, the Haiku Work Horse Tote Bag sports a padded sleeve for a 15 in. laptop, a yoga-mat panel and a plethora of pockets to organize your life on the go. Roomy, zippered main compartment has an organizer panel, zip pocket, card slots and a key fob. Interior foam-padded pocket fits a 15 in. laptop. Front panel sleeve stows a yoga mat, jacket or baguette (or 2). Back slip pocket converts to a sleeve that fits over your wheeled luggage handle. 2 front zip pockets; 2 side bottle pockets. Tote-style handles with wrap padding and removable, adjustable shoulder strap give you carry options. Haiku Work Horse Tote Bag is made from recycled material.
short_description: Ideal for commuting or weekend getaways, the Haiku Work Horse Tote Bag sports a padded sleeve for a 15 in. laptop, a yoga-mat panel and a plethora of pockets to organize your life on the go.
